TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckBoxField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField

summary.span: 表示在資料繫結控制項中顯示為核取方塊的布林值欄位。

span.span: Represents a Boolean field that is displayed as a check box in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可供資料繫結控制項 (例如和) 的布林值的資料欄位值顯示核取方塊。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display the value of a Boolean data field in a check box. 物件顯示的方式會根據使用它的資料繫結控制項。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控制顯示物件做為資料行，而控制項顯示為一個資料列。For example, the control displays a object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. > [!NOTE] > 核取方塊已停用 （唯讀） 直到資料繫結控制項顯示包含核取方塊，在編輯模式中的記錄。A check box is disabled (read-only) until the data-bound control displays a record that contains the check box in edit mode. 如需有關如何置於編輯模式中的一筆記錄的詳細資訊，請參閱文件包含的父控制項物件。For more information on how to put a record into edit mode, see the documentation for the parent control that contains the object. 若要指定的欄位中顯示物件、 設定屬性與欄位的名稱。To specify the field to display in a object, set the property with the field's name. > [!NOTE] > 可以顯示核取方塊，只選取或未選取的狀態，因為物件可以繫結至欄位的布林資料型別或可剖析字串只。Because a check box can display only a selected or an unselected state, a object can be bound only to a field with a Boolean data type or a string that can be parsed by . 您可以藉由設定顯示每個核取方塊旁的標題屬性。You can display a caption next to each check box by setting the property. A資料繫結中的物件為隱藏狀態負責控制何時屬性設定為`false`。A object is hidden in a data-bound control when the property is set to `false`. 若要防止在編輯模式中修改欄位的值，將屬性`true`。To prevent the value of a field from being modified in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 在資料繫結會控制該插入記錄的支援 (例如控制項)，您可以隱藏物件在插入模式下，藉由設定屬性`false`。In data-bound controls that support inserting records (such as the control), you can hide a object in insert mode by setting the property to `false`. 您可以自訂的頁首和頁尾區段物件。You can customize the header and footer sections of a object. 若要在頁首或頁尾區段中顯示標題，請設定或屬性，分別。To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the or properties, respectively. 而不是顯示在標頭區段的文字，您可以藉由設定顯示影像屬性。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 標頭區段可能會隱藏在物件藉由設定屬性`false`。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些資料繫結控制項 (例如控制項) 即可顯示或隱藏只控制項的整個標頭區段。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支援這些資料繫結控制項個別的繫結欄位的屬性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual bound field. 顯示或隱藏的整個標頭區段的資料繫結控制項 （如果有的話），請使用控制項的`ShowHeader`屬性。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property. 您也可以自訂的外觀藉由設定欄位的不同部分的樣式屬性的物件 （例如字型色彩、 背景色彩等等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子系 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||頁尾區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||標頭區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的資料項目的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件存放至控制項來顯示 Microsoft SQL Server 資料來源的欄位具有布林資料類型。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object in a control to display a field from a Microsoft SQL Server data source with a Boolean data type. [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxField/CS/checkboxfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxField/VB/checkboxfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 將欄位加入至動態建立的資料繫結控制項時，通常會使用這個建構函式。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要以動態方式加入物件資料繫結控制項，請建立新物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果您使用控制項，加入物件集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您以動態方式可以將欄位加入資料繫結控制項，強烈建議的所有欄位以靜態方式宣告，然後顯示或隱藏，視需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that all fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 以靜態方式宣告所有的欄位可減少的父資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式，以動態方式將物件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxFieldCtor/CS/checkboxfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxFieldCtor/VB/checkboxfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

param.span: 表示包含唯讀欄位的值，否則為 。

span.span: to include the values of read-only fields; otherwise, .

summary.span: 使用指定 物件的值填入指定的 物件。

span.span: Fills the specified object with the values from the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供便利的方式來擷取欄位的值從指定為物件存放至物件。The method is provided as a convenient way to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified object in a object. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 這個方法不會傳回值。This method does not have a return value. 相反地，將欄位值傳回透過傳物件傳入的`dictionary`參數。Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter. 在呼叫方法之後，逐一查看物件來存取的欄位值。After the method has been called, iterate through the object to access the field values. > [!NOTE] > 如果物件包含唯讀欄位，則必須傳入`true`如`includeReadOnly`參數來包含這些值。If the object contains read-only field values, you must pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter to include those values.

summary.span: 擷取在設計工具中呈現 物件時用於欄位值的值。

span.span: Retrieves the value used for the field's value when rendering the object in a designer.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來判斷何值轉譯時，顯示欄位設計工具中的物件。The method is a helper method used to determine what value to display for a field when rendering the object in a designer. 如果未從資料來源在設計階段擷取實際資料，這個方法所傳回的值改為顯示。If real data can not be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead.

para.span: 在擴充類別，您可以覆寫此方法以傳回不同的值，以顯示在設計工具中的欄位。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override this method to return a different value to display for the field in a designer.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 編碼的值，可協助防止跨網站指令碼的攻擊和惡意內容顯示。HTML-encoding values can help prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed.

summary.span: 將欄位的值繫結至 物件中的核取方塊。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來繫結中對應的核取方塊的資料來源中的欄位值物件。The method is a helper method used to bind the value of a field in the data source to a corresponding check box in the object.

exception.span: 欄位值所繫結的控制項不是 控制項。

\- or -

exception.span: 欄位值無法轉換成布林值。

span.span: The field value cannot be converted to a Boolean value.

summary.span: 取得或設定要在 物件中每個核取方塊旁邊顯示的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption to display next to each check box in a object.

value.span: 中每個核取方塊旁邊顯示的標題。

span.span: The caption displayed next to each check box in the .
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來顯示在每個核取方塊旁的標題物件。The property is used to display a caption next to each check box in a object. 如果屬性設為空字串，不顯示任何標題。If the property is set to an empty string, no caption is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 中的所有核取方塊物件共用相同的標題。All check boxes in the object share the same caption. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂中的核取方塊的標題物件存放至控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom caption for the check boxes in a object in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxField/CS/checkboxfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxField/VB/checkboxfieldvb.aspx#1)]

Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();

summary.span: 判斷 物件中所包含的控制項是否支援回呼 (Callback)。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來判斷控制項是否包含在支援回呼的物件。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks. 這個方法已經作為空方法 （不包含任何程式碼的方法），表示支援回呼實作。This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported.

para.span: 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫此方法，指出是否根據欄位支援回呼所包含的控制項。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指出支援回呼，實作這個方法作為空方法不會擲回例外狀況。有用的訊息，說明為什麼不支援回呼，否則擲回例外狀況。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
